title: CBN holds benchmark rate steady in disinflation phase

content: The Central Bank of Nigeria has again held the Monetary Policy Rate at 27 per cent, marking the fourth pause this year as it prioritises stability amid a slowing but still elevated inflation cycle. W… [+11636 chars]
